discourse_list.title: Proposal: Automating using fees to burn MKR or to grow the surplus

content.content: Hi can we make the usage of SF to burn MKR or grow the surplus a dynamic process… for example: 1- if the SF is enough to burn more than 100 MKR a day then we should use it all to burn MKR 2- if the SF is enough to burn 60 MKR we use SF 50%/50% between burning and growing the surplus 3- if the SF is not enough to burn more than 30 MKR a day then we use it all to grow the surplus this way we use the fees to burn MKR when it is cheap and grow the surplus when it is expensive also, this will lessen the burden on governance
